title: Bug 114903 - Default values are not shown in Show Report Parameters' dialog
description: When trying to modify a parameter in the 'Show Report Parameters' dialog, default values are not displayed as expected.
OB: When I click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, no default values are displayed in the value boxes.
EB: When I preview the report and click the 'Show Report Parameters' button, I expect to see default values displayed in the value boxes for each parameter. This would allow me to easily modify the parameter I want to change.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Preview the report.
2. Click the 'Show Report Parameters' button.
3. Observe that the value boxes for all parameters are empty, despite expecting default values to be displayed.
